verses.roman:
premā krame bāḍi' haya--sneha, māna, praṇaya
rāga, anurāga, bhāva, mahābhāva haya

synonyms: premā—love of God; krame—gradually; bāḍi'-increasing; haya—is; sneha—affection; māna—indignation due to affection; praṇaya—love; rāga—attachment; anurāga—subattachment; bhāva—ecstasy; mahā-bhāva—exalted ecstasy; haya—is.
translation: "Love of Godhead increases and is manifest as affection, counter-love, love, attachment, subattachment, ecstasy and sublime ecstasy.
